attributes.action: fine the CSA for mis-management when dealing with non-resident parent calculations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The CSA are regularly mis-calculating payments due by non resident parents based on inaccurate wages and accounts (for the self employed).  They do not wish to listen to you when you contact them and are just interested in getting more money into their pots and fleecing parents who are trying to make an honest living and want to make fair payments for their children.
